memberdef.name: upload

briefdescription.para: Transfers data to the GPU buffer from RAM.

simplesect.para: Transfers data from buffer[offset*sizeof( T )] to buffer[(offset+count-1)*sizeof( T )].

parameterdescription.para: The staging buffer used to transfer the data.
The queue used to execute the transfer.
The command pool on which the command buffer will be created.
The data to upload, packed (will be aligned on upload).
The data size.
The start offset.
The pipeline stage flags for the out memory barrier.
